text: 10|39|Eninum, avarkal tankal arival terintu kolla mutiyatataiyum, (nikalumena) atil kurappattavai nikalatirukkaiyil avarraiyum (atil kurappatta marravarraiyum) poyyena avarkal kurukinranar.Ivarkalukku munniruntavarkalum ivvare (tankal arivukku ettatataiyum, tankal kanatataiyum) poyyenak kurikkontiruntanar. Akave, anta aniyayakkararkalin mutivu eppati mutintatu enpatai (napiye!) Kavanippiraka
